name: Palindromic Rheumatism
chief_complaint: I keep getting sudden joint pain and swelling that comes and goes
physical_findings: No residual joint damage between attacks
Normal range of motion between episodes
prognosis: Variable - may progress to rheumatoid arthritis in 30-50% of cases, or remain episodic
description: A rare inflammatory arthritis characterized by sudden, recurrent attacks of joint pain and swelling that resolve completely between episodes. Attacks typically last hours to days without causing permanent joint damage. Often a precursor to rheumatoid arthritis.
